page.title: 13READING HABITS
page.content: In our area it was found that Catherine Cookson was the most popular writer but although this conclusion was reached most people asked did not have a preference.Next most popular were Steve Jackson,Douglas Reeman Thomas Hardy, Wilbur Smith,Richard Adams,Kenneth Graham,Alastair Mclean and James Herriot. Romantic novels,thrillers and biographies seemed to be the favourite types of books amongst adults - with children the new adventure/game book is becoming increasingly popular The reading of daily newspapers appears to be on the decline.Those who read one are in the minority according to our survey.The tabloids,notably THE SUN,was most popular.On Sunday,the "heavier"papers did better with THE SUNDAY TIMES prominent.
